page.title: 권한얻기
page.content: MS Web Application 추가하기         Microsoft account Developer Center에서 application을 생성한다. [앱 추가]버튼이 있다.     Microsoft account Developer Center url     https://apps.dev.microsoft.com/#/appList     MS Developer Center 사이트에서 만들어진 앱을 들어가서 Platform을 만든다.     타입을 선택한다. (Web / Native / Web API)                 참고문서         Authenticate using Microsoft account (consumer apps)     Sign users in and get an access token (consumer apps)            Authentication flow 정하기         Token flow     Gets an access token in one call. Useful for quick access, but doesn't provide a refresh token for long term access.     Also called the Implicit flow.     Code flow     Gets an authorization code in the first call and exchanges the code for an access token in the second call. When used with the wl.offline-access permission scope, your application receives a refresh token that enables long-term access.     Also called the Authorization code flow.            Scope 설정하기    office.onenote    wl.offline_access <- refresh_token을 얻기 위해서 필요한 scope.        2.Code flow 로 인증하기    이 통신에 성공하려면 client_secret세팅을 해야 하는 것 같다.    Application password를 생성하고 다시 통신 시도 하니까 잘 나온다.    Step1.요청url    GET https://login.live.com/oauth20_authorize.srf?response_type=code&client_id=865496b1-2311-48a1-a2a9-ecf755f092f7&redirect_uri=https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/geoseong-page/projecthub/index.html&scope=office.onenote    Step1.결과    Code={codeString}    https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/geoseong-page/projecthub/index.html?code=M4e36190b-b340-a348-a6ba-69b42c97103a    Step2.요청url    POST https://login.live.com/oauth20_token.srf￼Content-Type:     application/x-www-form-urlencoded    Body(x-www-form-urlencoded):    grant_type=authorization_code￼&client_id={client-id}￼&client_secret={client-secret}￼&code={code}￼&redirect_uri={redirect-uri}    Step2.결과    {        "token_type": "bearer",        "expires_in": 3600,        "scope": "office.onenote wl.signin",        "access_token":"",        "authentication_token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjEifQ..OH1Xws4bK4TPNwRwtwYzC8nOXauqb_K7fo1SqHc1V4Y",        "user_id": "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHOcqEuldbnr3EAsMzgFXHs"    }            Token 얻기    Scope를 유의깊게 숙지하며 사용하도록.    Web API로 만들었을 때    요청url    https://login.live.com/oauth20_authorize.srf?response_type=token&client_id=865496b1-2311-48a1-a2a9-ecf755f092f7&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Flogin.live.com%2Foauth20_desktop.srf&scope=office.onenote    에러메시지1    Error=unsupported_response_type    &error_description=The provided value for the input parameter 'response_type' is not allowed for this client. Expected value is 'code'.    요청url 2    https://login.live.com/oauth20_authorize.srf?response_type=token&client_id=865496b1-2311-48a1-a2a9-ecf755f092f7&redirect_uri=api%3A%2F%2F865496b1-2311-48a1-a2a9-ecf755f092f7%2Faccess_as_user&scope=office.onenote    에러메시지2    Error=invalid_request    &error_description=The provided value for the input parameter 'redirect_uri' is not valid. The expected value is 'https://login.live.com/oauth20_desktop.srf' or a URL which matches the redirect URI registered for this client application.    Web으로 만들었을 때    요청url    https://login.live.com/oauth20_authorize.srf?response_type=token&client_id=865496b1-2311-48a1-a2a9-ecf755f092f7&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fs3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com%2Fgeoseong-page%2Fprojecthub%2Findex.html&scope=wl.signin    성공. 예를 누르고 나서의 url    https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/geoseong-page/projecthub/access_token=EwAYA61DBAAUcSSzoTJJsy%2bXrnQXgAKO5cj4yc8AAYirwMSKENs8CMLl6jjQFitGreWvgStDWDEoyutOJzIa2c6QWYWnrd3PvE60P15jZX/MD2AmUbMzCnygr%2bgYFe%2biBayepttvIUi4Dms8xzKGw2KdmKNb6kHjNjEp1s%2bkD6HZpnVGcUZgt/gowVwEfBNvQmL%2bF4%2b7fzB8DJXkn1QcSg2Rm3WvHUMCuEPp7pWL4E/KBKivqimg%2bz1oSBIJujo1IijqipylJHXdL/HUN0h8i3ZyzbO%2bZrHUi5e3L6NpKuImYiROzdJMvs1WB4/Y6t1o7oNxBpctv4CiQYFQTEnkkfUs1AQwvKkEJPbIRvlWPlgQKEhqqC5D6eb8IQvpAyQDZgAACLaNz9WDvtxx6AEjF5ynjmSF%2b6MqlgYXRwjuVdH0ylERzqqT6sL7Exm0rxeZ03bill0%2biu2P74Z5ZcIX1KfK4wkJ%2bm8LbF7EomqxG9r8VlLVO74czhuAzsLXNZpGzrZt3pdUO/qJmj90yJqSqT7mgAD8jnvK3JI/iU8Em/zLi6jELMp6zCqUTP5%2bApXwPy0QQA3htGU7V2fBV0f/JWI3XT8VkRs9QMoVLUlh8Krt9wrOy3kCZr%2b0MiNOEAItdfzwBJEseWTN700ezsLz144qpucqK3ZcFr%2bjhJmdl4ux5hFDPRrrSqKCBoVP/fBaFcXHuQF1Z07nMKKwfotmYquuBmHwbuaoZj4e7BG7dGjRk0blLRIMqjHNBwA2I6GEkAZHt9%2b%2byIpNyGU2UOaKliM71GJEpl77TST4SnuJtdSEy3h47DX4J3SPENN3LzPUL7ALp6EiEn5m/6MojbF1D2/9o%2b%2b64c2LsEjTwx56tkF1AnD0m6QYOJxEic1CQaIgFRZvYN8o7E6f4jVneF5j7GaR%2bs9VRKl3r9AodpfDFXbl7JgrjuAxKr/5mJdeSOg%2bDkcFty16Y6qQncEKssu2JFjwJ5PXq5Ip91UXkL73J7mqQqBVZzQwBwPIUudBE4yQ16JQj0WbUZ4EzN30rgiKsPLiDOc%2bMhYC&token_type=bearer&expires_in=3600&scope=wl.signin&user_id=AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHOcqEuldbnr3EAsMzgFXHs    화면
page.html:
MS Web Application 추가하기

  1. Microsoft account Developer Center에서 application을 생성한다. [앱 추가]버튼이 있다.

    2. Microsoft account Developer Center url

    https://apps.dev.microsoft.com/#/appList

  2. MS Developer Center 사이트에서 만들어진 앱을 들어가서 Platform을 만든다.
  3. 타입을 선택한다. (Web / Native / Web API)


참고문서

  • Authenticate using Microsoft account (consumer apps)
  • Sign users in and get an access token (consumer apps)

Authentication flow 정하기

  1. Token flow

    2. Gets an access token in one call. Useful for quick access, but doesn't provide a refresh token for long term access.

    Also called the Implicit flow.

  2. Code flow

    3. Gets an authorization code in the first call and exchanges the code for an access token in the second call. When used with the wl.offline-access permission scope, your application receives a refresh token that enables long-term access.

    Also called the Authorization code flow.


Scope 설정하기

office.onenote

wl.offline_access <- refresh_token을 얻기 위해서 필요한 scope.


2.Code flow 로 인증하기

이 통신에 성공하려면 client_secret세팅을 해야 하는 것 같다.

Application password를 생성하고 다시 통신 시도 하니까 잘 나온다.

Step1.요청url

GET https://login.live.com/oauth20_authorize.srf?response_type=code&client_id=865496b1-2311-48a1-a2a9-ecf755f092f7&redirect_uri=https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/geoseong-page/projecthub/index.html&scope=office.onenote

Step1.결과

Code={codeString}

https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/geoseong-page/projecthub/index.html?code=M4e36190b-b340-a348-a6ba-69b42c97103a

Step2.요청url

POST https://login.live.com/oauth20_token.srf￼Content-Type:

application/x-www-form-urlencoded

Body(x-www-form-urlencoded):

grant_type=authorization_code￼&client_id={client-id}￼&client_secret={client-secret}￼&code={code}￼&redirect_uri={redirect-uri}

Step2.결과

{

"token_type": "bearer",

"expires_in": 3600,

"scope": "office.onenote wl.signin",

"access_token":"",

"authentication_token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjEifQ..OH1Xws4bK4TPNwRwtwYzC8nOXauqb_K7fo1SqHc1V4Y",

"user_id": "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHOcqEuldbnr3EAsMzgFXHs"

}



Token 얻기

Scope를 유의깊게 숙지하며 사용하도록.

Web API로 만들었을 때

요청url

https://login.live.com/oauth20_authorize.srf?response_type=token&client_id=865496b1-2311-48a1-a2a9-ecf755f092f7&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Flogin.live.com%2Foauth20_desktop.srf&scope=office.onenote

에러메시지1

Error=unsupported_response_type

&error_description=The provided value for the input parameter 'response_type' is not allowed for this client. Expected value is 'code'.

요청url 2

https://login.live.com/oauth20_authorize.srf?response_type=token&client_id=865496b1-2311-48a1-a2a9-ecf755f092f7&redirect_uri=api%3A%2F%2F865496b1-2311-48a1-a2a9-ecf755f092f7%2Faccess_as_user&scope=office.onenote

에러메시지2

Error=invalid_request

&error_description=The provided value for the input parameter 'redirect_uri' is not valid. The expected value is 'https://login.live.com/oauth20_desktop.srf' or a URL which matches the redirect URI registered for this client application.

Web으로 만들었을 때

요청url

https://login.live.com/oauth20_authorize.srf?response_type=token&client_id=865496b1-2311-48a1-a2a9-ecf755f092f7&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fs3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com%2Fgeoseong-page%2Fprojecthub%2Findex.html&scope=wl.signin

성공. 예를 누르고 나서의 url

https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/geoseong-page/projecthub/access_token=EwAYA61DBAAUcSSzoTJJsy%2bXrnQXgAKO5cj4yc8AAYirwMSKENs8CMLl6jjQFitGreWvgStDWDEoyutOJzIa2c6QWYWnrd3PvE60P15jZX/MD2AmUbMzCnygr%2bgYFe%2biBayepttvIUi4Dms8xzKGw2KdmKNb6kHjNjEp1s%2bkD6HZpnVGcUZgt/gowVwEfBNvQmL%2bF4%2b7fzB8DJXkn1QcSg2Rm3WvHUMCuEPp7pWL4E/KBKivqimg%2bz1oSBIJujo1IijqipylJHXdL/HUN0h8i3ZyzbO%2bZrHUi5e3L6NpKuImYiROzdJMvs1WB4/Y6t1o7oNxBpctv4CiQYFQTEnkkfUs1AQwvKkEJPbIRvlWPlgQKEhqqC5D6eb8IQvpAyQDZgAACLaNz9WDvtxx6AEjF5ynjmSF%2b6MqlgYXRwjuVdH0ylERzqqT6sL7Exm0rxeZ03bill0%2biu2P74Z5ZcIX1KfK4wkJ%2bm8LbF7EomqxG9r8VlLVO74czhuAzsLXNZpGzrZt3pdUO/qJmj90yJqSqT7mgAD8jnvK3JI/iU8Em/zLi6jELMp6zCqUTP5%2bApXwPy0QQA3htGU7V2fBV0f/JWI3XT8VkRs9QMoVLUlh8Krt9wrOy3kCZr%2b0MiNOEAItdfzwBJEseWTN700ezsLz144qpucqK3ZcFr%2bjhJmdl4ux5hFDPRrrSqKCBoVP/fBaFcXHuQF1Z07nMKKwfotmYquuBmHwbuaoZj4e7BG7dGjRk0blLRIMqjHNBwA2I6GEkAZHt9%2b%2byIpNyGU2UOaKliM71GJEpl77TST4SnuJtdSEy3h47DX4J3SPENN3LzPUL7ALp6EiEn5m/6MojbF1D2/9o%2b%2b64c2LsEjTwx56tkF1AnD0m6QYOJxEic1CQaIgFRZvYN8o7E6f4jVneF5j7GaR%2bs9VRKl3r9AodpfDFXbl7JgrjuAxKr/5mJdeSOg%2bDkcFty16Y6qQncEKssu2JFjwJ5PXq5Ip91UXkL73J7mqQqBVZzQwBwPIUudBE4yQ16JQj0WbUZ4EzN30rgiKsPLiDOc%2bMhYC&token_type=bearer&expires_in=3600&scope=wl.signin&user_id=AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHOcqEuldbnr3EAsMzgFXHs

화면
